alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Helena Valley; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 10:53AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains, Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains, Helena Valley, and Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Helena Valley; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
